title: Riot Fix Your Game - Cannot load games
body:
So here's another tale on how this new client is a pristine piece of software...

I have attempted to play 3 ranked games recently, trying with both the new client and the old client, and straight after champion selection has finished, it takes me straight to the 'reconnect' button, where I can spend the 3 minutes before my team surrenders just mashing the shit out of it, to no avail. And now, thanks to your fully sick client, im stuck in low priority...If anyone has a solve for this, that'd be handy. But if not, can you just fox this forsaken new client of yours?

* Additional info: No, I do not have LoLReplay or any other external applications in relation to LoL installed, and yes I've ended all LoL related processes before reloading the client.

replies.body:
The updated client is still in testing so it can run into some issues, but your specific case seems to be unrelated.  It sounds like your specifically having issues keeping a stable connection with the game server, and getting cut off.  

The game server is what you're connecting to well after you depart from the client post champion select.  So, regardless of whatever client you use, you'll want to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is able to holy a strong connection to the game.  

Let me know if you have any questions!
hey there, it doesn't seem to be an issue with my connection, my internet is running perfectly fine. Any other suggestions?

Your internet can be absolute perfection and speedy, but it doesn't make it immune from reaching specific servers.  It's really important to go over each step to rule out any possibilities.  You can also run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get a better overview.  Hope that clears things up.
